item.title: Power BI and Data
item.description: Few of the dashboards and analytics tools we worked on to inform the ITSM and technology trends in R1 universities. What problem are you trying to solve using technology ? Let’s discuss. Portfolio ITSM Dashboard Template Visit App This app was designed as a part to continuously monitor the KPI metrics
